Ratings.comment: I've recommended this class to half a dozen friends, all of whom have also loved it. Dr. Robinson and her course truly changed my perception of health and medicine and left a lasting impact on my career. It's very obvious she care very deeply about the course and knows a lot about the material. I learned so much from her.

Dr. Robinson is incredibly disorganized and poor at replying to emails. She is difficult to reach outside of class. Her exams pull from questions we never talked about. Her slides almost never match the one she gives us because they're out of order. There's a lot of reading and writing for this class. If possible, avoid her.

I have had Dr. Robinson throughout graduate school, so I might have a bit of a different report as compared to those who have her for undergrad classes. I absolutely love Dr. Robinson - she is a lot of fun. She isn't super "type A," so some people who type-A personalities may have other opinions, but I've always enjoyed her courses!
